author: @32A419
text: you guys should train a chat gpt like Ai with communists texts, there was a paper that said that Ais are better in changing people's opinions than humans !

replies.author: @rsavage-r2v
replies.text:
There are a few on ChatGPT but you can only access them if you have the paid tier. I use them a lot to help clarify my studies and to help me prepare my thoughts to talk to people.

The ones that exist now are trained just on Marx, Engels and Lenin but it would be great to have a tankie megamind that had been fed everything in existence. For example, the chatbot "RedTheory" struggles sometimes if I ask it really specific questions about Hoxha.

There are also a few chatbots trained on anarchist "theory", which are fun to grill sometimes. They parse all the major anarchist works and they can't come up with anything beyond "We should do idealism more better."

author: @garrettramirez428
text: Umberto Eco's theory of fascism isn't widely accepted by Marxists. The classic theory is by Georgi Dmitrov.
